entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 10 Preview 2 #350
  • .NET Framework 3.5 images for Windows Server 2025 will no longer be published after May 13th #349

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add IMemoryPoolFactory to Connections.Abstractions #61003
  • Add a Tailwind CSS Template for Blazor in .NET CLI #61002
  • Unable to have scoped dependency using constructor injection for convention-based middleware #61001
  • aspnetcore build failing in arm64 and PGO with link time error #60999
  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics to Semantic conventions for ASP.NET Core metrics #60998
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, json #60997
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef, mTls-handshakes-httpsys #60996
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #60995
  • Blazor web app, global InteractiveServer, .NET 9. Localization. During culture change strange exceptions occur #60993
  • Quarantine `ConnectionCanSendAndReceiveMessages` #60992
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.NamedPipes.Tests` #60991
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Sockets` #60990
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests` #60989
  • Generate OpenAPI documents on build throws DirectoryNotFoundException when application calls 'Directory.SetCurrentDirectory(AppContext.BaseDirectory)' #60987
  • OpenAPI schema generation for nullable enums produce a null value option #60986
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #60984
  • Blazor Interactive Server Deployed on ACA delivers 404 on websockets #60981
  • Blazor: Custom Directives #60980
    Backlog

Closed

  • SignalR eats JSON serialization exceptions during streaming responses #56303
    10.0-preview3
  • Create simpler way to show Not Found 404 UI with Blazor #45654
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, json #60974
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #60985
  • Hybrid Cache silently fails to correctly handle cached tuples #60934
  • Why does the hash code of the HttpContext in the Action not change when the client sends multiple requests? #60988
  • In Minimal API Content-type of the response is overriden with application/json making it unusable for SSE #60965
  • Perf improvement: caching, mTls-handshakes-httpsys #60949
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, json_middleware #60975
  • In Minimal API, there are binding issues when using `FromForm`. #60556
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable SiteExtensions build in VMR Pass 2 #61004
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't build ANCM forwarders in VMR #61000
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, Perf, blog-candidate, 10.0-preview3
  • Add SignalR client log for stream item binding failure #60857
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview3
  • Use Kind Artifact metadata and minor improvements to Signing/Publishing.props #60967
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, 10.0-preview3
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2025-03-13 #60918
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Only run issue-locker action on weekdays #60979
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix OpenAPI XML code gen #60977
    area-mvc
  • Use trim-safe ValidationContext constructor and update RuntimeParameterInfoResolver #60976
    area-minimal
  • pin gha #60948
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve flaky tests, move tests blockade. #60930
    test-failure, area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Fixes dictionary binding error for numeric key/value #59911
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: extensions #8697
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: add more open issues #9234

Merged

  • Update null-conditional-assignment.md #9233
  • Update null-conditional-assignment.md #9232
  • Extensions: update with decisions from LDM 2025-03-17 #9228

Updated

  • Describe scoping rules for extension declaration type parameters and receiver parameter #9229
  • Document breaking change for proposal discussion Wednesday #9230

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Queries regarding the usage of Microsoft.Data.SqlClient AccessTokenCallback in EFCore #35812
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient is not supported on this platform. #35810
  • Remove parent of an `OwnsMany` collection throws `SqlException` for `The INSERT statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint "FK_PostSummaryTag_PostSummary_PostId"`. #35809
  • Query/JSON: different results between Tracking and NoTracking for JSON where same json property is present multiple times with different values #35807

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #35796
    9.0.x
  • Problem with Oracle provider when DbContext abstract base class in a different assembly to concrete DbContext #35803
  • Support for `OUTPUT`/`RETURNING` in ExecuteUpdateAsync/ExecuteDeleteAsync #35811

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST ONLY] Move AdHocJsonTests to core, so that they also run for Cosmos #35808

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor not scrolling correctly with Keyboard Up and VerticalTextAlignment #28491

    .NET 10.0-preview2

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • IDE Error: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. #77012
  • error while overriding an abstract generic method with type constraint and with nullable return class #77655
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35918.02 #77653
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35918.19 #77652

Updated

  • 'Target Project' drop-down list is always empty in Launch Profiles > Roslyn Component #77582
  • Completion still suggests items that do not satisfy generic constraint #76986
    Backlog
  • Binary Log Support in Roslyn #76740
    .NET 10
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync fails when dotnet is not pre-installed in the system #77640
  • Test plan for "null-conditional assignment" #75554
    .NET 10
  • [EE] Switch to newer version of IDkmClrExpressionCompiler.CompileExpression API and report error when module reading fails #76887
  • Unnecessary cast added to the `default` arm in the `IDE0066` fixer #77084
  • Exception in `CSharpInlineMethodRefactoringProvider` when multiple fields are declared in a field declaration #76656
  • Suppress warning for generated code #41171
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Support textDocument/semanticTokens/full #77665
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Refresh `features/extensions` branch with latest bits from `main` #77663
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Add feature to convert classic extension methods to the new 'extension' form in C# 14. #77660
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: Adjust accessibility and file-type checks for extension members #77657
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a background thread. #77654
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix updating committed solution with insignificant changes #77648
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support ILogger.BeginScope() for LSP logging #77647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we get telemetry signal for `Implement with Copilot` Code Fix #77643
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Generate Documentation - Bug Fixes #77641
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix generation of attribute with array constant #77661
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: flesh out behavior for some pattern-based binding scenarios #77608
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix watch window completion window upon manual completion invocation #77656
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProvider import lazy to avoid loading VS.EA.Copilot #77516
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Change vs deps flow #77651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Another small set of package initialization optimizations #77646
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77666
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #77267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade to VSSDK.BuildTools 17.14.1043-preview2 #77580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: update semantic model APIs #77619
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change keys for import caching #77627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [TEST] Enable buildcheck #76756
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce iteration over regmaskTP in relevant methods #113670
  • EnvelopedCms.ContentEncryptionAlgorithm.Parameters is empty after call to Decode on Windows #113668
  • How do I debug dotnet code in a hostfxr C++ app? (Not Visual Studio mixed mode) #113665
  • NativeAOT runtime crash with source-generated serialization ('Failed to create generic virtual method implementation') #113664
  • Faulty codegen SkipLocalsInit Nullable<T> default value arm64 #113658
    10.0.0
  • MONO_WASM: jit_call code generation failed in Blazor WASM project #113657
    9.0.x
  • Linux x64 machine running out of space #113652
  • Speed improvements for Maths.Abs() on integers #113651
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembers` annotations do not seem to be working on type delcarations. #113650
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding IMemoryOwner<T>.Slice and IMemoryOwner<T>.AsReadOnly #113644
  • [S.T.J] JsonProperty unused private field #113643
    Future
  • [mono-runtime] "unknown option: -verbose" on mono based archs while running xunit console runner validating System.IO.Tests #113642
  • [API Proposal]: Enhance X509Store Import to Support Secure Private Key Storage (Linux & Cross-Platform) #113641
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/6/2025 2:14:44 PM +00:00 #113655
    10.0.0
  • [Android AOT] Precompiling failing in .NET 9 #113672

Closed

  • `TypeBuilder.CreateType()` gets stuck in infinite loop when creating a type that has itsself as parent #112072
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect nullable annotation on [FromKeyedServices]? #113585
  • c# program segfaults when ran under callgrind #113043
  • Some runtime symbol packages are missing DotNetReleaseShipping=true #112023
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #113052
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.XmlDsigExcC14NTransformTest.ExcC14NSpecExample5 #113049
    10.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Support containment for instructions `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #81522
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Enable contained form for shlx, sarx, shrx and on x86 #67314
    Future
  • Incorrect marshalling of Bool return types in new exception handling #113574
    10.0.0
  • build coreclr parts required for the interpreter #113065
  • HttpClient inconsistant behaviour #113605
    10.0.0
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] No nightly stress runs for old versions #113372
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.BasicTest_WithReadsCompletedCheck #113635
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.CloseAsync_ByServer_AcceptThrows #113636
  • [HttpStress] Linux image is running out of disk space #111660
    10.0.0
  • dotnet OpenSSL double free with Ubuntu 24.04 #109689
    10.0.0
  • JIT: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_33529 fails under OSR stress #111625
    10.0.0
  • [browser] streaming HTTP HEAD fails in Firefox with TypeError: e.body is null #111992
    8.0.x
  • Native AOT ARM32 lanes failing after docker update #113609
    10.0.0
  • Vector128 and Vector256 Shuffle produces unexpected asm #113582
  • WCF on Linux - Kerberos Authentication with UpnEndpointIdentity seems to be sending the wrong name-type to the KDC. #31040
  • Marshal.SizeOf of bool and char report wrong value #113599
  • SizeConverter is trying to convert even before verifying the value could be converted #92424
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert JitHelper `JIT_StrCns` to QCall #113674
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add SpanSplitEnumerator.Source #113673
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • WIP: this is a test #113671
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] [HttpStress] Re-enable ASAN for msquic #113669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Target NetFrameworkCurrent in tests and remove old mentions #113667
    needs-area-label
  • Support HasThis calling convention in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #113666
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • [workloads] Bump the downlevels in main to 9.0.3/8.0.14 #113663
    needs-area-label
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Pin SHAs for container images""" #113659
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0

    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete vestiges of unused assembly formats #113646
    area-System.Reflection
  • [Mono]: Additional support for signal async safe stack-walks. #113645
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Scaffold SLH-DSA based on ML-DSA #113634
    area-System.Security

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift projection tooling] Add comprehensive e2e testing of symbol retrieval and preprocessing #3049
  • [Swift projection tooling] Implement parser of TBD files in JSON format. #3048
  • [Swift projection tooling] Consider removing MachO logic as we are using TBD files instead #3047
  • [Swift bindings] Enable safety checks that help prevent null reference exceptions #3046

Closed

  • [Swift language features] Add equality comparison for Swift Structs #3029

PullRequests

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Normalize the box type in resume stubs #3042
    area-async
  • [swift] Use TBD files to retrieve symbols missing from abi.json #3034
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Add support for Equality protocol #3031
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Shipping] Test StoreKit bindings on MacCatalyst #3040
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Project value types with heap-allocated properties as C# classes #3038
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `PathUtility.HasExtension` doesn't correctly consider case sensitivity of file system #47705
  • GenerateToolsSettingsFile races to write DotnetToolSettings.xml in parallel MTFM builds. #47696
  • dotnet watch crashes with "The WebSocket is in an invalid state ('Aborted') for this operation. Vallid states are: 'Open, CloseReceived'" #47685

Closed

  • When trying to install a tool where the required runtime isn't installed, a bad error message is generated #46566
  • Redundant SCA reports #45750
  • `BuildArgsWithDotnetRun` doesn't forward global properties #47614
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet tool restore started failing on macOS with NU3037 and NU3028 errors after 11th February #46857
    9.0.3xx
  • New dotnet test experience should produce binlog for the evaluation done to calculate TestModules #47494
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Update implicit versions for March #47710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update prerelease branding for preview 4 #47709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove publishing opt-out for nuget assets #47708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove RunSettingsFilePath support from dotnet test for MTP #47706
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Remove no longer used TestOptions.Configuration #47703
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702

    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 10.0.100-preview.2.25164.1 March 2025 Updates #47699

  • Add ThreadPoolSpinCount config var #47697
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid using AssetDetails, but FileLength and LastWriteTime directly on StaticWebAsset #47695
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • allow container targets to be loaded directly for multi-rid publish invocations since we handle that now #47693
    untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/9.0.3xx] light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47691
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Backport perf fixes #47689
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump versions for test templates #47688
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up #nullable disable from test directory #47686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Forward global props to dotnet run #47694
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Check for Muxer path relative to base directory #47664
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add command 'dotnet project convert' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Compare tar.gz files between VMR and current .NET builds #47667
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor binlog and use in dotnet test and dotnet run #47660
    Area-dotnet test
  • Update MSTest templates for .NET 10 #47658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create tsaoptions.json for VMR #47668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add IBC switch and disable by default #47670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.2.25160.1 #47447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Move command folder sources #47620
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • dotnet CLI: Removed CommandLineValidation directory #47619
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • enforce OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    untriaged, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown

  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
